lead_paragraph: SALKO--Ellen G.,a resident of White Plains, passed away on January 27, 2016 at the age of 79. She was born on October 19, 1936 to the late Gerald and Irma Greenebaum. Ellen was a baker, bookkeeper, author, teacher and homemaker. She was predeceased by her beloved husband, Alan Salko. Ellen is survived by her three children; David Salko, Larry Salko, and Judy Bergman, a daughter-in-law, Lisa Salko, as well as six grandchildren, Jake, Lauren, Jennifer, Ben, Michael, and Matthew. A funeral service will be held in the chapel at Ferncliff Cemetery on Friday, January 29th at 10am. 1/3
